 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלוֺשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשָׁה‎</span><sub>430</sub> **noun masculine and feminine** ==a three, triad== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שלש‎</span> [[BDB#SI|SI]]<sup>2</sup>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שלשן‎</span> 30 [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>2</sup>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שלש‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šalaštu, šalatu***</u></abbr>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שלתֿ‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 47, 124</sup>, but also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֿלתֿ‎</span>, etc., Id.<sup>47, A. u. A. ii. 175</sup> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>No. 31, 8</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּלָתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלת‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>377</sup>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלת‎</span> (in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלת מאה‎</span>) [[BDB#Reckend|Reckend]]<sup>ZMg xiii (1888), 408</sup>; see also [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 208</sup>); — 

**masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺשׁ‎</span>- rare, chiefly late), with **noun feminine** [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]] + 90 t., also construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשׁ‎</span> [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] + 65 t. (but [[Gen.38.24|Gen 38:24]] read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשֶׁת‎</span> Samaritan, compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָשֿׁ‎</span> [[Exod.21.11|Exod 21:11]] **feminine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשָׁה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺשָׁה‎</span>- rare, chiefly late), with **noun masculine** [[Gen.6.10|Gen 6:10]] + 149 t., also construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשֶׁת‎</span> [[Amos.4.4|Amos 4:4]] + 92 t. (3 + 10 = 13 are additional; on rare exceptions to rule of gender compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97c»§ 97c</sup>), suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָשְׁתְּכֶם‎</span> [[Num.12.4|Num 12:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָשְׁתָּם‎</span> v[[Num.12.4|Num 12:4]]; [[Ezek.40.10|Ezek 40:10]]; [[Ezek.41.16|Ezek 41:16]] — ***three*** (Hexateuch chiefly [[BDB#P|P]]): 

**1.** no other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** before plural noun, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלשׁ‎</span> 51 t., e.g. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Exod.27.1|Exod 27:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאַמָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.27|1Kgs 7:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשָׁה‎</span> 90 t., e.g. [[Gen.18.2|Gen 18:2]] + (so always <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשֶׁת‎</span>; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁלשֶׁת‎</span> [[Gen.38.24|Gen 38:24]] Sam [[BDB#Di|Di]]; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְּׁ‎</span>, from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןֿ‎</span>); after noun (late: on [[1Sam.1.24|1Sam 1:24]] see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלֵּשׁ‎</span>) [[1Chr.25.5|1Chr 25:5]] + 17 t.; noun omitted [[1Sam.17.4|1Sam 17:4]]; [[2Sam.24.12|2Sam 24:12]] = 42 t. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** = ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשׁ‎</span> [[Exod.19.5|Exod 19:5]] ***on third day***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיּוֺם שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּמִים‎</span> [[1Sam.9.20|1Sam 9:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיּוֺם הַשּׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.30.13|1Sam 30:13]], both = ***three days ago***; especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.28|1Kgs 15:28]] + 7 t. ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:134o»§ 134o</sup>). 

**2.** 13, with **noun feminine**: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשׁ עֶשְׂרֵהשָׁנַה‎</span> [[Gen.17.25|Gen 17:25]]; [[1Kgs.7.1|1Kgs 7:1]] + (as ordinal) [[Gen.14.4|Gen 14:4]] ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשֿׁ‎</span>), [[Jer.1.2|Jer 1:2]]; [[Jer.25.3|Jer 25:3]] before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערים‎</span> [[Josh.21.19|Josh 21:19]] after, [[Josh.19.16|Josh 19:16]] + 3 t., before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר‎</span> [[Josh.21.33|Josh 21:33]]; [[1Chr.6.43|1Chr 6:43]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמּוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.40.11|Ezek 40:11]] with **noun masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשָׁה עָשָׂר‎</span> before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרִים‎</span> [[Num.29.14|Num 29:14]] after, v[[Num.29.13|Num 29:13]] ordinal before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]]; [[Esth.9.1|Esth 9:1]] after, v[[Esth.9.17|Esth 9:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> omitted [[Esth.3.13|Esth 3:13]]; [[Esth.8.12|Esth 8:12]]; [[Esth.9.18|Esth 9:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גוֺרָל‎</span> omitted [[1Chr.24.13|1Chr 24:13]]; [[1Chr.25.20|1Chr 25:20]]; [[1Chr.26.11|1Chr 26:11]]. 

**3.** 300 = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.5.22|Gen 5:22]] + 59 t. ([[1Chr.11.11|1Chr 11:11]] perhaps intentional change [H[[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>Sm</sup>] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶה‎</span> \|\| [[2Sam.23.8|2Sam 23:8]] which certainly original, [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and modern); 3000 = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשֶׁת אֲלָפִים‎</span> [[Exod.32.28|Exod 32:28]] +28 t. 

**4.** c. tens, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> following [[Num.1.43|Num 1:43]] + 11 t., precedes [[Lev.12.4|Lev 12:4]] +17 t., + (as ordinal) 3 + 20 [[Jer.52.30|Jer 52:30]] +3 t.; 20 + 32 Ki [[Jer.12.7|Jer 12:7]] + 2 t. 

**5.** as round, or conventional, number: 2 (***or***) 3, [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]]; [[Deut.17.6|Deut 17:6]]; [[Josh.7.3|Josh 7:3]]; [[2Kgs.9.32|2Kgs 9:32]]; [[Isa.17.6|Isa 17:6]] 3 (***and***) 4, [[Prov.30.15|Prov 30:15]]; [[Prov.30.18|Prov 30:18]]; [[Prov.30.21|Prov 30:21]]; [[Prov.30.29|Prov 30:29]] ***three days' journey*** [[Exod.3.18|Exod 3:18]]; [[Exod.5.3|Exod 5:3]]; [[Exod.8.23|Exod 8:23]], etc.
